title: Team tilters
body:
So how exactly is it fair that if your "teammates" are trolling you constantly and ruining your experience of the game, that they get no punishment, all because they're not breaking any of the rules. But if you're toxic, even the slightest bit you get called out on it? Like is that fair? It's stupid how much your teams can do and get away with it?
 Someone please explain

replies.body: thats the problem with solo q/ playing with out friends if you arent good enough to solo carry and wont change even with the new honnor update pretty much find adleast a duo or group you can play with becasue lol is so heavily a team game you actually need a team to climb rank unless you are already have a better skill lvl then the elo you are in
The Chinese have taken over OCE sadly.
